name: Very Rough Wireframe Samples
description:
The intention of these wireframes is to show basic layer naming and organization. They are basically paper-napkin-sketch level fidelity, which means they aren't gridded, they aren't scaled to HIG/Material specs, etc.


If you use these for any project, I high recommend you put a grid system in place (I like base-8, mostly using 16, 24, 32, 48, 64, 96, and 128 pixel spacings). I also recommend reading up on Human Interface Guidelines and Material Design, or whatever design system your organization is using.


Auto layout is your friend.
